Home: CREATE TABLE home (id INT(6) UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, firstname VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,lastname VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,email VARCHAR(50),reg_date TIMESTAMP)
About_Us: CREATE TABLE About_Us (id VARCHAR(30) PRIMARY KEY, type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,title VARCHAR(55) NOT NULL,description VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL)
contact_us: CREATE TABLE contact_us (id VARCHAR(30) PRIMARY KEY, type VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,name VARCHAR(55) NOT NULL,address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,contact_no VARCHAR(55) NOT NULL )
user: CREATE TABLE user (id VARCHAR(30) PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,email VARCHAR(55) NOT NULL,password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL)
